snippet: ROSEFSKY--Julie. We mourn the passing of our dear friend Julie. Her wit, beauty, charm and intelligence marked her life, and heroism marked her fight with cancer. We will miss her light in this world. Lawrence and Melissa Rosenbloom and their entire family 1/3
lead_paragraph: ROSEFSKY--Julie. We mourn the passing of our dear friend Julie. Her wit, beauty, charm and intelligence marked her life, and heroism marked her fight with cancer. We will miss her light in this world. Lawrence and Melissa Rosenbloom and their entire family 1/3
